attributes.review: ✨terrible app✨ took FOREVER to download. it doesn’t even work well don’t waste your time on this pitiful app. 🦋 it shouldn’t of even taken that long because I downloaded it exactly at 69 days until the world ends 🧚🏻‍♀️ and it made my phone crash so I couldn’t call the dentist to help save my drowning fish 😡😡😡😡 so now my fish rat jr. is gone thanks a lot ✨✨✨✨✨😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😂😡😡😡😂

attributes.review: DISGUSTING PRESIDENT JOE BIDENT FOR PRESIDENT HE DOESNT EVER HELP HE IS TRYING TO KILL ALL OF US! IT TOOK ME 4 YEARS TO DOWNLOAD LOL STOP TROLLING US
attributes.title: THE WORST APP TO EVER LIVE

attributes.review: I’m not even sure an app can get worse than this. Against the popular vote my family downloaded this on my phone. I guess that’s what happens when you have the electoral college. Then I had to deal with all the lies and tweets that it sends as notifications for 4 years. Do not recommend, hopefully won’t need it for another 4 years.
attributes.title: The absolute worst

attributes.review: This app didn’t really have that “wow” factor to me. I’ve seen better made apps that are more useful. Worse yet, it took FOUR years to finally delete and I’ve felt so ashamed to have it on my phone for that long of a time. Really didn’t do anything that whole time too, was just a waste of energy and room. Do not recommend.
attributes.title: Took four years to delete

attributes.review: It took 3 years to load! I tried to play subway surfers and it crashed because of this app! And when I got on it my phone snapped in half I just got it repaired! It cost 28272828 dollars! Im gonna  go tell monokuma to tell all of his friends to rate this bad! GRRRRR 😾😾😾😾😾😾😾😡😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: this app fricken  🅢   🅤   🅒    🅚    🅢  so much. as soon as i downloaded it things got crazy. my cousin got the corona virus and spread it to my grandparents who spread it to the rest of everyone in my family. so i bet we’ll all go 💀 𝓻𝓲𝓹! also my cat screeched randomly for  N O reason. oh. wait it was because it realized I GOT THE TRUMP 2020 APPJDKAJDHSJAKA my cat honestly seemed so disappointed in me, same with my whole family actually. so tbh this app has ruined my life 🙃 let’s not forget to mention that this app smells like rotting 𝓹𝓲𝓰 meat. and yes ❤️ i CAN smell it all the way over here. i’ll delete this app real quick, hope y’all join me! 😘

attributes.review: this app was so slow and laggy. i downloaded it to hear more about covid-19 and unfortunately it kept crashing before i could get through the articles. this was so disappointing, i just don’t think i will be using this app anymore.
attributes.title: horrible, if i could go beneath 1 star i would
